name: Boomlings MatchUp
description:
Can you handle the Boom?

- Featured in "New & Noteworthy" in over 45 countries!

The Boomlings are back, and they need your help!

Get ready for over 400 levels of mind-boggling puzzle action! Help the Boomlings get back in order and bring back harmony to Boomlia. Are you up to the task?

Features:
- Progress through over 400 levels of different sizes, shapes and colors!
- Earn stars as you help the Boomlings get back in place!
- GameCenter Achievements with reward icons!

The question is...Can you handle the Boom?
